feed.title: OpnForm Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update nginx.conf by @niels-website in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/687
  • Fix tag selection method in home page component by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/690
  • Quill translate bug by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/689

New Contributors

  • @niels-website made their first contribution in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/687

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.6.1...v1.6.2

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.6.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixed docker build. * i18n Cookie issue by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/694 * Add support for additional language locales by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/693

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.6.3...v1.6.4

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.6.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve resources loading by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/692
  • Add workspace update functionality by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/699
  • Enhance form submissions column management by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/691
  • when duplicate form remove removed_properties by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/702
  • On duplicate form re-generate slug by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/703
  • Clean up empty HTML and help text in form inputs by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/700
  • Refactor form property logic rule to load condition mapping from external JSON file by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/698
  • fix camera upload for mobile by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/686
  • Fix redirect URL mentions by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/707

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.6.4...v1.6.5

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.6.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • integration modal close modal improve by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/708
  • ESC 483 - Add localized 'Yes' and 'No' translations for checkbox fields by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/710
  • Refactor form initialization and data management in OpenForm component by @JhumanJ in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/709
  • Billing flow redirect by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/713
  • Enhance JWT Token Management and Authentication Flow by @JhumanJ in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/720
  • Hidden field can never be required. Skip that validation by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/716
  • Barcode scanner issue fixed by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/721
  • support barcode on opentable by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/724
  • Add regex matching filters to open_filters.json by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/722
  • ESC-507 Enhance CheckboxInput and ToggleSwitchInput Components with Help Slot… by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/728
  • Refactor Form Not Found Handling and Improve Error Response by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/730
  • Create form abuse page by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/731
  • Decouple title from title block by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/696
  • Re-login modal by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/717
  • Add 'exists_in_submissions' and 'does_not_exist_in_submissions' valid… by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/725
  • Add Template Creation Functionality in Admin Panel by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/729
  • Replace env() usage within app by @mgilfillan in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/735
  • Sentry + Nuxt upgrade by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/738
  • Implement AI Loading Messages and Enhance Locale Handling in Forms by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/737
  • Refactor Discord and Slack Integration Handlers for Improved Data For… by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/736
  • Add FormProgressbar Component and Refactor OpenForm.vue by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/740
  • Add Telegram Notification Integration by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/732

New Contributors

  • @mgilfillan made their first contribution in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/735

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.6.5...v1.6.6
